name: PastaMania - Italian Casual Dining @ HarbourFront Centre

reviews.text: It is such a nice lunch experience because you have a very helpful and friendly staff named Brigitte. I love your Tom yum pasta as the sauce is refreshing, will definitely be back soon again!

Came on a Friday with a friend very good and fast service with friendly workers :) very pleased with the food, portion and service. Would love to specially thank service brigette and manager hidayah for their good service and attitude. Recommend coming here!

I had a query on the membership and the manager nurhidayah assisted me and even helped to explain the concept of the membership to me.

Thankfully i was able to have a better understanding of the membership and got my 1-1 deal!

Also great service to the rest of the crew!

Thumbs up!

You will be disappointed if you are expecting any sort of service here. You order and make payment via a QR code at your table.

The plates from the previous diners were cleared, but the tables were not wiped. I had to use my own wet wipes to clean the table for them. I should have gotten a discount for that. LOL.

Servers lacked energy and looked like they didnâ€™t want to be there.

We ordered Otah Aglio, Beef Lasagna, and Seafood Rebus Calzone. All tasted decently good.

Update: closed
Ordered online at 7pm aafter checking google. Order & Payment went through with pickup stating asap but it was closed at 4pm.
Wonder why they dont close their online systems as well.
